answers.answer: Dear Friend,Would require a lot more details than this.1) Duration of symptoms.2) Age/sex/Height/Weight.3) Pattern of symptoms.4) Final Impression mentioned in the MRI.5) Who ordered for the MRI and what he said after reading the MRI report.) Any other medical illness (Diabetes/Thyroid/Blood Pressure related illness).So please give these information.Regards.

question: abnormal MRI. Inflammation of brain veins and arteries. Symptoms, off balance, headaches, falling.
title: Abnormal MRI
